welcome_message_body: Welcome to Northcote, New Zealand! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful city, known for its stunning vistas, vibrant arts scene, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Northcote has to offer.

restaurants.name: The Engine Room
restaurants.description: The Engine Room is a restaurant located in Auckland.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal for all international flights at Auckland International Airport.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The terminal for all domestic flights at Auckland International Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Surfdale Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ardmore Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Ardmore Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
